thread.section_title: CanvasOnSale Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of CanvasOnSale | canvasonsale.com
thread.title: Marina Obraztsova

author: Marina Obraztsova
title: Marina Obraztsova
text: I've ordered few big canvas prints for myself and family, because the price was awesome, but then it occurred to me to read the reviews, and then I started worrying, because there were a lot of negative ones. However, I didn't have to worry for long - the prints arrived very quickly, and I couldn't have been more pleased with them. After that I ordered more, and was happy again.
